text: Minatomirai Station () is a railway station of Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company in Nishi-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company : Minatomirai Line ::Limited Exp. :::Yokohama - Minatomirai - Motomachi-ChÅ«kagai ::Commuter Exp., Expless :::Yokohama - Minatomirai - Bashamichi ::Local :::Shin-Takashima - Minatomirai - Bashamichi ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Yokohama
